Text: Hey @Nepotu dude.I can see that this is 720p so thats rocks and rules both.Even better.So thanks a lot for this upload and a big thanks to all,that do their thing and make this games to work for us.Cheers.:-)

thank you mate! Dimmis80 is right and all your will never be taken for granted... for us Basket-Ball fans, this is heaven on earth! and believe me, i've been watching NBA since 1985... Your quality is superb... long live Nepotu!
Thank you, jmbsc, but the riper are the first person who worth the aplauses. For that reason he is specified in my credits. But thank you, my friend. You're very kind.
